snippet.title: Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games Tokyo 2020 Arcade Edition | Sega Amusements
snippet.description:
Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games Tokyo 2020 is the the only official licensed arcade game for the Olympic Games Tokyo 2020! Players can participate in twelve events, including GYMNASTICS, RUGBY, DISCUS THROW, TRIPLE JUMP, 100M, SPORT CLIMBING, SURFING & SWIMMING; as well as four retro events DIVING, 110M HURDLES, SHOOTING and VAULT that pay homage to the Olympic Games Tokyo 1964.

Choose from a legendary cast of characters including MARIO, SONIC, LUIGI, AMY, TAILS, KNUCKLES, DR. EGGMAN, SHADOW, YOSHI, WARIO, BOWSER, and PEACH.

TM IOC/TOKYO2020/36USC220506. © 2019 IOC. © NINTENDO. ©SEGA.TM IOC/TOKYO2020/USOC 36USC220506. © 2019 International Olympic Committee (“IOC”). All rights reserved. SUPER MARIO characters © NINTENDO. Trademarks are property of their respective owners. SONIC THE HEDGEHOG characters © SEGA. SEGA, the SEGA logo and Sonic The Hedgehog are either registered trademarks or trademarks of SEGA Holdings Co., Ltd. or its affiliates.
